tool_description:
PaperQuotes is the collection of more than 2 million quotes for free! Quotes can be queried from any category and tags.

API also allows you to download an image from quotes, which can be posted to social networks.
name: PaperQuotes
title: PaperQuotes

api_list.name: /quotes
api_list.description: GET Quotes filtered by tags or category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paperquotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paperquotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://paperquotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paperquotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
